toCVQue.specialServices: Do you use a device or service such as a telehealth device, care alarm, fire alarm or security alarm that connects to your home phone line?
toCVQue.impairment: Do you, or anyone else in your household have an impairment which would make you vulnerable in the event of a power outage?
toCVQue.mobile: Do you have a mobile phone?

hdmi.qshdmi: The Set-Top Box added to the order requires HDMI to connect with TV. Does the TV due to be connected to the Virgin TV 360 box have HDMI inputs?
